apis.description:
Retrieve the list of objects to be shown on the planner for the current user
with the associated planner override to override an item's visibility if set.

[
  {
    "context_type": "Course",
    "course_id": 1,
    "visible_in_planner": true, // Whether or not it is displayed on the student planner
    "planner_override": { ... planner override object ... }, // Associated PlannerOverride object if user has toggled visibility for the object on the planner
    "submissions": false, // The statuses of the user's submissions for this object
    "plannable_id": "123",
    "plannable_type": "discussion_topic",
    "plannable": { ... discussion topic object },
    "html_url": "/courses/1/discussion_topics/8"
  },
  {
    "context_type": "Course",
    "course_id": 1,
    "visible_in_planner": true,
    "planner_override": {
        "id": 3,
        "plannable_type": "Assignment",
        "plannable_id": 1,
        "user_id": 2,
        "workflow_state": "active",
        "marked_complete": true, // A user-defined setting for marking items complete in the planner
        "dismissed": false, // A user-defined setting for hiding items from the opportunities list
        "deleted_at": null,
        "created_at": "2017-05-18T18:35:55Z",
        "updated_at": "2017-05-18T18:35:55Z"
    },
    "submissions": { // The status as it pertains to the current user
      "excused": false,
      "graded": false,
      "late": false,
      "missing": true,
      "needs_grading": false,
      "with_feedback": false
    },
    "plannable_id": "456",
    "plannable_type": "assignment",
    "plannable": { ... assignment object ...  },
    "html_url": "http://canvas.instructure.com/courses/1/assignments/1#submit"
  },
  {
    "visible_in_planner": true,
    "planner_override": null,
    "submissions": false, // false if no associated assignment exists for the plannable item
    "plannable_id": "789",
    "plannable_type": "planner_note",
    "plannable": {
      "id": 1,
      "todo_date": "2017-05-30T06:00:00Z",
      "title": "hello",
      "details": "world",
      "user_id": 2,
      "course_id": null,
      "workflow_state": "active",
      "created_at": "2017-05-30T16:29:04Z",
      "updated_at": "2017-05-30T16:29:15Z"
    },
    "html_url": "http://canvas.instructure.com/api/v1/planner_notes.1"
  }
]

with the associated planner override to override an item's visibility if set.

[

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description:
Only return items starting from the given date.
The value should be formatted as: yyyy-mm-dd or ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description:
Only return items up to the given date.
The value should be formatted as: yyyy-mm-dd or ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Only return items that have new or unread activity

apis.description: Retrieve a planner override for the current user

operations.notes: Retrieve a planner override for the current user

apis.description: Retrieve a planner override for the current user

operations.notes: Retrieve a planner override for the current user

apis.description: Update a planner override's visibilty for the current user

operations.notes: Update a planner override's visibilty for the current user

parameters.name: marked_complete
parameters.description: determines whether the planner item is marked as completed

parameters.name: dismissed
parameters.description: determines whether the planner item shows in the opportunities list

apis.description: Create a planner override for the current user

operations.notes: Create a planner override for the current user

parameters.name: plannable_type
parameters.description: Type of the item that you are overriding in the planner

parameters.name: plannable_id
parameters.description: ID of the item that you are overriding in the planner

parameters.name: marked_complete
parameters.description: If this is true, the item will show in the planner as completed

parameters.name: dismissed
parameters.description: If this is true, the item will not show in the opportunities list

apis.description: Delete a planner override for the current user

operations.notes: Delete a planner override for the current user

PlannerOverride.description: User-controlled setting for whether an item should be displayed on the planner or not

id.description: The ID of the planner override

plannable_type.description: The type of the associated object for the planner override

plannable_id.description: The id of the associated object for the planner override

user_id.description: The id of the associated user for the planner override

workflow_state.description: The current published state of the item, synced with the associated object

marked_complete.description: Controls whether or not the associated plannable item is marked complete on the planner

dismissed.description: Controls whether or not the associated plannable item shows up in the opportunities list

created_at.description: The datetime of when the planner override was created

updated_at.description: The datetime of when the planner override was updated

deleted_at.description: The datetime of when the planner override was deleted, if applicable
